CustomField.description: Tracking for the inside sales team involves the number of opportunities that are "accepted" by the inside account managers. To do so, we'll want to know how many opportunities move from 10% to 20%. Using this field as timestamp for opportunities that move to 20%. This would be similar to the timestamps that we use for leads (i.e. timestamp - marketing qualified, timestamp - sales qualified, etc.
CustomField.label: Timestamp - Qualification
